items.sentence: Tom has been waiting all his life for a woman like Mary.
Tom has been waiting for Mary for more than three hours.
Tom has lost a lot of blood and the doctors are worried.
Tom had many opportunities to meet Mary over the summer.
Tom studies French every morning before he goes to work.
Tom suspects that Mary is the one who stole his bicycle.
I\'m convinced Tom had nothing to do with what happened.
I\'m not sure my parents would want me to give you that.
Why don\'t you come over to my house for dinner tonight?
It was not until a few days later that the news arrived.
Tom quit his job and decided to travel around the world.
Tom started to answer the question, but was interrupted.
Tom was disappointed that he couldn\'t get into Harvard.
I think that was one of the best movies I\'ve ever seen.
Tom ate some of my rice while I was away from the table.
Tom broke one of the rules and was kicked out of school.
Tom broke up with Mary and started going out with Alice.
Tom burned all the pictures he had of his ex-girlfriend.
I started studying French when I was in the third grade.
I don\'t know why Tom didn\'t do what I asked him to do.
Tom was standing at the bar when I walked into the club.
Perhaps we shouldn\'t be doing this without Tom\'s help.
Tom put on oven mitts and took the cake out of the oven.
Tom reads the newspaper on the train on his way to work.
Tom realized there was nothing he could do to help Mary.
Tom was the first one to realize Mary wanted to do that.
Tom advised me to sell the farm and live somewhere else.
Tom and John both said that they were in love with Mary.
Tom isn\'t here because he\'s in Boston at a conference.
Tom became aware that he had forgotten to tie his shoes.
Tom built a house on the land he bought three years ago.
Tom thought Mary would like to go to Boston to see John.
I\'m often mistaken for a girl because I have long hair.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning on doing that.
When was the last time you told your wife you loved her?
When I was a child, my parents often bought toys for me.
Tom said he had to do some things he didn\'t want to do.
I don\'t suppose there\'s much chance of that happening.
I don\'t think I\'ll be able to convince Tom to do that.
Tom didn\'t seem to want to tell me why he\'d done that.
I\'m tired, but I still have a lot of work I need to do.
Tom may not be the only one here who understands French.
Tom doesn\'t know what\'s going on, but he\'ll find out.
Tom didn\'t care how it got done as long as it got done.
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to admit he was wrong.
Tom is one of the most irritating people I\'ve ever met.
Tom is so gullible he\'ll believe anything you tell him.
Tom posed for a picture in front of his office building.
Tom poured some milk into a glass and handed it to Mary.
Tom and Mary are getting ready to go on their honeymoon.
